title: Ravshan Kulob
text: Ravshan Kulob is a <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="Kulab%2C%20Tajikistan">Kulob</a>, <a href="Tajikistan">Tajikistan</a>, formed in 1965 as FK Ansol Kulob. The club was renamed FK Olimp-Ansol Kulob in 2003, before changing to its current name in 2005. They currently play in the <a href="Tajikistan%20Higher%20League">Ligai Olii Tojikiston</a> and play their home matches at <a href="Kulob%20Central%20Stadium">Kulob Central Stadium</a>.
